attributes.action: open toilets at all manned train stations to the time they close.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment most train station toilets only open until around 6.00pm and i think that this is a disgrace. It's as if the train companies are saying that no one uses the trains after this point and that is entirely not true. People still need to pee long into the night!
